review_data.title: Delicious and fun!
review_data.content: If it is vegetarian that you are looking for, this is the place to go to! The place is funky, eclectic and the food is so good. The atmosphere is happy and locals. The service is great! This is the oldest vegetarian restaurant in Europe.

review_data.title: Superb for the vegetarian, or anyone really
review_data.content: Top vegi restaurant for over 100 years. A real jewel. Only problem might be with such a large selection at the buffet, the cacophony of flavors you are tempted with might be too much. Family and dog friendly. Wait staff exceptionally friendly.

review_data.title: Great Vegetarian Restaurant
review_data.content: This is a very nice vegetarian restaurant in Zurich with also a good selection of curries. There is also a buffet option though we ordered from the menu. Good service and very good quality.
